data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yang, Chaopin, Sun, Yuan, Zhi, Tingting, Iwaki, Takashi, Reyda, Florian B., Yang, Tingbao (2016): Two new and one redescribed species of Acanthobothrium (Cestoda: Onchoproteocephalidea: Onchobothriidae) from Dasyatis akajei (Myliobatiformes: Dasyatidae) in the China Sea. Zootaxa 4169 (2): 286-300, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4169.2.3|6 occurrences
